parameters.name: Subscriptions
parameters.query:
summarize by subscriptionId
| project value = strcat("/subscriptions/", subscriptionId), label = subscriptionId, selected = iff(subscriptionId =~ '{DefaultSubscription_Internal}', true, false)

parameters.name: Workspaces
parameters.query:
where type =~ 'microsoft.operationalinsights/workspaces'
| where strcat('/subscriptions/',subscriptionId) in ({Subscriptions})
| project id

parameters.name: Servers
parameters.query:
where type == "microsoft.sql/servers"
| where strcat('/subscriptions/',subscriptionId) in ({Subscriptions})
| project id=tolower(id)

parameters.name: Databases
parameters.query:
where type == "microsoft.sql/servers/databases"
| where strcat('/subscriptions/',subscriptionId) in ({Subscriptions})
| project id=tolower(id)
| extend serverName = split(id,'/databases/')[0]
| where serverName in ({Servers})
| project id

links.linkLabel: Analytics over SQL Server audit events

content.title: Defender coverage, by subscription

parameters.name: AlertSeverity
parameters.query:
SecurityAlert
| where AlertType startswith "SQL."
| where tolower(ResourceId) in ({Databases})
| summarize Count = count() by AlertSeverity
| order by Count desc, AlertSeverity asc
| project Value = AlertSeverity, Label = strcat(AlertSeverity, ' - ', Count)

content.query:
let data = SecurityAlert
| where "{AlertSeverity:lable}" == "All" or AlertSeverity in ({AlertSeverity})
| where AlertType startswith "SQL."
| where tolower(ResourceId) in ({Databases});
data
| summarize Count = count() by AlertSeverity
| join kind = inner (data
 | make-series Trend = count() default = 0 on TimeGenerated from {TimeRange:start} to {TimeRange:end} step {TimeRange:grain} by AlertSeverity)
 on AlertSeverity
 | project-away TimeGenerated
| extend AlertSeveritys = AlertSeverity
| union (
 data 
 | summarize Count = count() 
 | extend jkey = 1
 | join kind=inner (data
 | make-series Trend = count() default = 0 on TimeGenerated from {TimeRange:start} to {TimeRange:end} step {TimeRange:grain}
 | extend jkey = 1) on jkey
 | extend AlertSeverity = 'All', AlertSeveritys = '*' 
)
| extend Severity = iif(AlertSeverity == "All", 0,iif(AlertSeverity == "High", 1, iif(AlertSeverity == "Medium", 2, iif(AlertSeverity == "Low", 3, 4))))
| order by Severity asc

SecurityAlert
| where AlertType startswith "SQL."
| where tolower(ResourceId) in ({Databases})
| where ResourceId != ""
| where AlertSeverity in ({AlertSeverity})
| summarize AlertCount = count() by ResourceId
| project Resource = tolower(ResourceId), AlertCount
| order by AlertCount desc

SecurityAlert
| where TimeGenerated {TimeRange}
| where "{AlertSeverity}" has AlertSeverity or isempty("{AlertSeverity}")
| where AlertType startswith "SQl."
| where tolower(ResourceId) in ({Databases})
| where ResourceId != ""
//| summarize Count=count() by ResourceId, bin(TimeGenerated,{TimeRange:grain})
| make-series Count = count() on TimeGenerated from ago(30d) to now() step {TimeRange:grain} by ResourceId

content.title: SQL Server alerts

content.query:
let data = SecurityAlert
| where AlertType startswith "SQL."
| where SystemAlertId == '{SelectedAlertId}';
let nodes = data
| project Id = SystemAlertId, Name = DisplayName, Size = 1, Kind = 'alert'
| union (
data 
| project parse_json(Entities), SystemAlertId
| mv-expand Entities
| evaluate bag_unpack(Entities)
| project Id = strcat(SystemAlertId, '-',$id), Name = strcat(ResourceId,Address), Size = 1, Kind = Type
);
let links = data
| project parse_json(Entities), SystemAlertId
| mv-expand Entities
| evaluate bag_unpack(Entities)
| project SourceId = SystemAlertId, TargetId = strcat(SystemAlertId, '-', $id), Size = 1, Kind = Type
;
nodes
| union (links)
| where Kind != ""

AzureDiagnostics 
| where tolower(ResourceId) in ({Databases})
| where data_sensitivity_information_s != "" 
| extend parsed=parse_xml(data_sensitivity_information_s).sensitivity_attributes.sensitivity_attribute  
| mvexpand parsed 
| extend label = tostring(parsed["@label"]) 
| where label != "" 
| summarize dcount = dcount(sequence_group_id_g) by label
content.title: Number of queries, by sensitivity label

content.query:
AzureDiagnostics 
| where tolower(ResourceId) in ({Databases})
| where data_sensitivity_information_s != "" 
| extend parsed=parse_xml(data_sensitivity_information_s).sensitivity_attributes.sensitivity_attribute  
| mvexpand parsed 
| extend info_type = tostring(parsed["@information_type"]) 
| where info_type != "" 
| summarize dcount = dcount(sequence_group_id_g) by info_type
content.title: Number of queries, by information type

content.query:
AzureDiagnostics 
| where tolower(ResourceId) in ({Databases})
| where data_sensitivity_information_s != "" 
| extend parsed=parse_xml(data_sensitivity_information_s).sensitivity_attributes.sensitivity_attribute  
| mvexpand parsed 
| extend Principal = server_principal_name_s
| summarize dcount = dcount(sequence_group_id_g) by Principal
content.title: Number of queries, by principal

content.query:
AzureDiagnostics
| where tolower(ResourceId) in ({Databases})
| where isempty(data_sensitivity_information_s) == false
| extend parsed=parse_xml(data_sensitivity_information_s).sensitivity_attributes.sensitivity_attribute  
//| evaluate bag_unpack(parsed, columnsConflict='keep_source')
| mvexpand parsed 
| project TimeGenerated, ResourceId, Label = tostring(parsed.['@label']), InformationType = tostring(parsed.['@information_type'])
    , Succeeded = succeeded_s, Principal = server_principal_name_s, ClientIP = client_ip_s, Application = application_name_s, Statement = statement_s, Rows = response_rows_d, Action = action_name_s
| where Label != "" or InformationType != ""
| where isempty('{SelectedLabel}') or (strcat('"',Label,'"') in (split('{SelectedLabel}',',')))
| where isempty('{SelectedInformationType}') or (strcat('"',InformationType,'"') in (split('{SelectedInformationType}',',')))
| where isempty('{SelectedPrincipal}') or (strcat('"',Principal,'"') in (split('{SelectedPrincipal}',',')))

AzureDiagnostics 
| where tolower(ResourceId) in ({Databases})
| where data_sensitivity_information_s != "" 
| extend parsed=parse_xml(data_sensitivity_information_s).sensitivity_attributes.sensitivity_attribute  
| mvexpand parsed 
| extend label = tostring(parsed["@label"]) 
| where label != "" 
| summarize dcount = dcount(sequence_group_id_g) by label_and_app = strcat(label, " | ", application_name_s)
| order by label_and_app asc, dcount desc
content.title: Application access to classified data (by sensitivity label)

content.query:
AzureDiagnostics 
| where tolower(ResourceId) in ({Databases})
| where data_sensitivity_information_s != "" 
| extend parsed=parse_xml(data_sensitivity_information_s).sensitivity_attributes.sensitivity_attribute  
| mvexpand parsed 
| extend label = tostring(parsed["@label"]) 
| where label != "" 
| summarize dcount = dcount(sequence_group_id_g) by label_and_ip = strcat(label, " | ", client_ip_s) 
| order by label_and_ip asc, dcount desc
content.title: IP access to classified data (by sensitivity label)

content.query:
AzureDiagnostics 
| where tolower(ResourceId) in ({Databases})
| where data_sensitivity_information_s != "" 
| extend parsed=parse_xml(data_sensitivity_information_s).sensitivity_attributes.sensitivity_attribute  
| mvexpand parsed 
| extend info_type = tostring(parsed["@information_type"]) 
| where info_type != "" 
| summarize dcount = dcount(sequence_group_id_g) by info_type_and_app = strcat(info_type, " | ", application_name_s) 
| order by info_type_and_app asc, dcount desc
content.title: Application access to classified data (by information type)

content.query:
AzureDiagnostics 
| where tolower(ResourceId) in ({Databases})
| where data_sensitivity_information_s != "" 
| extend parsed=parse_xml(data_sensitivity_information_s).sensitivity_attributes.sensitivity_attribute  
| mvexpand parsed 
| extend info_type = tostring(parsed["@information_type"]) 
| where info_type != "" 
| summarize dcount = dcount(sequence_group_id_g) by info_type_and_ip = strcat(info_type, " | ", client_ip_s) 
| order by info_type_and_ip asc, dcount desc
content.title: IP access to classified data (by information type)

content.query:
AzureDiagnostics
| where TimeGenerated > {BaselineTimeRange:start}
| where ResourceType == "SERVERS/DATABASES"
| where Category == "SQLSecurityAuditEvents"
| where tolower(ResourceId) in ({Databases})
| extend Database = strcat(LogicalServerName_s, '/', database_name_s)
| summarize DailyCount = count() by ResourceId, Database, bin_at(TimeGenerated, 1d, now())
| make-series metric = sum(DailyCount) on TimeGenerated in range({BaselineTimeRange:start}, now()-1d, 1d) by ResourceId, Database
| extend series_decompose_anomalies(metric) // Anomaly detection
| project ResourceId, Database, day = (TimeGenerated), DailyCounts = metric, AnomalyScore = series_decompose_anomalies_metric_ad_score
| extend MaxAnomalyScore = AnomalyScore, MinAnomalyScore = AnomalyScore, AnomlyScoreTrend = AnomalyScore
| mv-apply MaxAnomalyScore to typeof(real) on (top 1 by MaxAnomalyScore desc)
| mv-apply MinAnomalyScore to typeof(real) on (top 1 by MinAnomalyScore asc)
| mv-expand with_itemindex=Index AnomalyScore
| where Index == array_length(DailyCounts)-1
| project-away day, Index
| extend AnomalyScoreAbs = abs(toreal(AnomalyScore))
| extend WasAnomalous = iif(MaxAnomalyScore > 3 or MinAnomalyScore < -3, true, false)
| extend Anomalous = iif(AnomalyScoreAbs > 3, true, false)
| order by AnomalyScoreAbs desc
content.title: Daily anomaly scores, by database

content.query:
AzureDiagnostics
| where TimeGenerated > {BaselineTimeRange:start}
| where ResourceType == "SERVERS/DATABASES"
| where Category == "SQLSecurityAuditEvents"
| where tolower(ResourceId) == tolower('{SelectedResource}')
| summarize DailyCount = count() by ResourceId, bin_at(TimeGenerated, 1d, now())
| make-series metric = sum(DailyCount) on TimeGenerated in range({BaselineTimeRange:start}, now()-1d, 1d) by ResourceId
| extend series_decompose_anomalies(metric) // Anomaly detection
| project ResourceId, day = (TimeGenerated), DailyCounts = metric, AnomalyScore = series_decompose_anomalies_metric_ad_score
content.title: Anomaly score over time for the selected database (from the list above)

content.query:
AzureDiagnostics
| where TimeGenerated > {BaselineTimeRange:start}
| where ResourceType == "SERVERS/DATABASES"
| where Category == "SQLSecurityAuditEvents"
| where tolower(ResourceId) == tolower('{SelectedResource}')
| summarize DailyCount = count() by ResourceId, bin_at(TimeGenerated, 1d, now())
| make-series metric = sum(DailyCount) on TimeGenerated in range({BaselineTimeRange:start}, now()-1d, 1d) by ResourceId
| extend series_decompose_anomalies(metric) // Anomaly detection
| project ResourceId, day = (TimeGenerated), DailyCounts = metric, AnomalyScore = series_decompose_anomalies_metric_ad_score
content.title: Daily activity over time for the selected database (from the list above)

content.query:
AzureDiagnostics 
| where Category == 'SQLSecurityAuditEvents'
| where tolower(ResourceId) in ({Databases})
| extend PrincipalName = server_principal_name_s, ClientIp = client_ip_s, HostName = host_name_s, ApplicationName = application_name_s, ActionName = action_name_s
    , Database = strcat(LogicalServerName_s, '/', database_name_s), isSuccess = succeeded_s, affectedRows = affected_rows_d, responseRows = response_rows_d
    , Statement = statement_s
    , q = {Quantify:value}, f = {Filter:value}
| extend indicator = case (
    f == 'All', 1,
    f == 'Statement', iff(isempty(Statement) == 'false', 1, 0),
    f == 'Execution', iff(Statement contains 'xp_' or Statement contains 'ps.exe' or Statement contains 'powershell' or Statement contains 'msdb exec', 1, 0),
    f == 'Drop', iff(Statement contains "drop table" or Statement contains "drop database", 1, 0),
    f == 'Outward', iff(Statement contains 'http:' or Statement contains 'https:' or Statement contains 'ftp:' or Statement contains 'curl ', 1, 0),
    f == 'OS', iff(Statement contains 'sys.dm_os', 1, 0),
    0)
| where indicator == 1
| extend quantity = case(
        q == 'Events', tolong(1),
        q == 'Successes', tolong(iff(isSuccess == 'true', 1, 0)),
        q == 'Failures', tolong(iff(isSuccess == 'false', 1, 0)),
        q == 'Egress', tolong(responseRows),
        q == 'Ingress', tolong(affectedRows),
        tolong(1))
| make-series sum(quantity) on TimeGenerated from ago(30d) to now() step 1d by {Aggregate:escapejson}
//| summarize Count = sum(quantity) by {Aggregate:escapejson}, bin_at(TimeGenerated, 1h, now())
| render timechart
content.title: Distribution by parameter

content.query:
AzureDiagnostics 
| where Category == 'SQLSecurityAuditEvents'
| where tolower(ResourceId) in ({Databases})
| where TimeGenerated {TimeWindow}
| extend PrincipalName = server_principal_name_s, ClientIp = client_ip_s, HostName = host_name_s, ApplicationName = application_name_s, ActionName = action_name_s
    , Database = strcat(LogicalServerName_s, '/', database_name_s), isSuccess = succeeded_s, affectedRows = affected_rows_d, responseRows = response_rows_d
    , Statement = statement_s, q = {Quantify:value}, f = {Filter:value}
| extend indicator = case (
    f == 'All', 1,
    f == 'Statement', iff(isempty(Statement) == 'false', 1, 0),
    f == 'Execution', iff(Statement contains 'xp_' or Statement contains 'ps.exe' or Statement contains 'powershell' or Statement contains 'msdb exec', 1, 0),
    f == 'Drop', iff(Statement contains "drop table" or Statement contains "drop database", 1, 0),
    f == 'Outward', iff(Statement contains 'http:' or Statement contains 'https:' or Statement contains 'ftp:' or Statement contains 'curl ', 1, 0),
    f == 'OS', iff(Statement contains 'sys.dm_os', 1, 0),
    0)
| where indicator == 1
| extend quantity = case(
        q == 'Events', tolong(1),
        q == 'Successes', tolong(iff(isSuccess == 'true', 1, 0)),
        q == 'Failures', tolong(iff(isSuccess == 'false', 1, 0)),
        q == 'Egress', tolong(responseRows),
        q == 'Ingress', tolong(affectedRows),
        tolong(1))
| summarize Count = sum(quantity) by {Aggregate:escapejson}
| sort by Count desc
content.title: Distribution by parameter

content.query:
AzureDiagnostics 
| where Category == 'SQLSecurityAuditEvents'
| where tolower(ResourceId) in ({Databases})
| where TimeGenerated {TimeWindow}
| project TimeGenerated, ResourceId, ClientIP = client_ip_s, Principal = server_principal_name_s
, HostName = host_name_s, ApplicationName = application_name_s, ActionName = action_name_s
, Database = strcat(LogicalServerName_s, '/', database_name_s), AdditionalInfo = parse_xml(additional_information_s), Statement = statement_s, isSuccessful = succeeded_s, f = {Filter:value}
| extend indicator = case (
    f == 'All', 1,
    f == 'Statement', iff(isempty(Statement) == 'false', 1, 0),
    f == 'Execution', iff(Statement contains 'xp_' or Statement contains 'ps.exe' or Statement contains 'powershell' or Statement contains 'msdb exec', 1, 0),
    f == 'Drop', iff(Statement contains "drop table" or Statement contains "drop database", 1, 0),
    f == 'Outward', iff(Statement contains 'http:' or Statement contains 'https:' or Statement contains 'ftp:' or Statement contains 'curl ', 1, 0),
    f == 'OS', iff(Statement contains 'sys.dm_os', 1, 0),
    0)
| where indicator == 1
| evaluate bag_unpack(AdditionalInfo)
//| evaluate bag_unpack(batch_information)
//| extend split(failure_reason, ',')
//| extend Error = tostring(failure_reason[(0)]), Level = trim(@"[^\w]+", tostring(failure_reason[(1)])), Reason = trim(@"[^\w]+", tostring(failure_reason[(2)]))
//| project-away failure_reason
| project TimeGenerated, ResourceId, Database, ClientIP, Principal, ApplicationName, HostName, ActionName, Statement, isSuccessful//, Error, Level, Reason
| sort by isSuccessful desc, TimeGenerated desc
content.title: Events Log

items.name: query: Piechart by parameter - Copy - Copy

parameters.name: SentinelWSs
parameters.label: Sentinel Workspaces
parameters.query:
where type =~ 'microsoft.operationsmanagement/solutions'
| where strcat('/subscriptions/',subscriptionId) in ({Subscriptions})
| where name startswith 'SecurityInsights'
| project tostring(properties.workspaceResourceId)

content.json:
Troubleshooting guide

Select one of the following SQL Alerts to investigate:

content.query:
SecurityAlert
| where Entities has "MICROSOFT.SQL"
| extend ['Azure Defender Alert'] = iff(isnotempty(AlertLink),"Open in Azure Defender","")
| extend Entities=tostring(Entities), ['Principal Name']=tostring(todynamic(ExtendedProperties)["Principal name"])
| distinct StartTime, ResourceId, DisplayName, AlertSeverity, ['Azure Defender Alert'], AlertLink, SystemAlertId, Entities, ['Principal Name'], RemediationSteps
| extend Entities=todynamic(Entities), RemediationSteps=todynamic(RemediationSteps)
| mv-apply element=Entities to typeof(dynamic) on 
(
    where element.Type == "azure-resource"
    | project ResourceId=tostring(element.ResourceId)
)
| where tolower(ResourceId) in ({Databases})
| mv-apply element=Entities to typeof(dynamic) on 
(
    where element.Type == "ip"
    | project ['Related IP']=element.Address
)
| join kind=leftouter (
SecurityIncident
| mv-expand AlertIds to typeof(string)
| project AlertIds, IncidentUrl
) on $left.SystemAlertId == $right.AlertIds
| project-away AlertIds
| extend ['Sentinel Incident']=iff(isempty(IncidentUrl), "This alert is not onboarded to Sentinel", "Open incident in Sentinel")
| extend SubscriptionId=tostring(split(ResourceId, '/')[2]), ResourceGroup=tostring(split(ResourceId, '/')[4]), SqlName=tostring(split(ResourceId, '/')[-1])
| order by StartTime desc
| project-rename ['Start Time']=StartTime, ['Alert Name']=DisplayName, ['Alert Severity']=AlertSeverity

content.json:
Step 1: Validate the activity in the logs:

This section presents the activity related to the entities in the alert: the IP, the database and the principal user within the selected time window around the alert.
  • Can you identify suspicious or unexpected activity?

parameters.name: TimeWin
parameters.label: Time window
parameters.description: Time window in days to search around the alert
parameters.query:
print TimeWin=range(1d, 7d, 1d)
| mv-expand TimeWin 
| extend TimeWin=totimespan(TimeWin)
| extend TimeWinText=strcat(toint(TimeWin/1d), iff(TimeWin == 1d, ' day ',' days '))//, toint(TimeWin/1d-toint(TimeWin/1d))*24, ' hours')

parameters.name: EmailContent
parameters.query:
print Subject="SOC inquiry",
Body="Dear User,

A suspicious activity was observed on your {SqlName} SQL server.
Please confirm you are aware of this activity, or contact us for assistance.

Thanks,
The SOC"
| project EmailContent=strcat('?subject=', Subject, '&body=', replace('
','%0d%0a',Body))

content.json: Search for all the activity of IP {ip}:

content.query:
let t = datetime({StartTime});
let timeWin = timespan({TimeWin});
let AzureDiagnosticsTable = view () { (AzureDiagnostics  | extend CategoryValue=Category, OperationName=strcat(OperationName,'/',action_name_s), ActivityStatus=iff(succeeded_s=="true", "Succeeded", "Failed")) };
union withsource=SourceTable isfuzzy=true 
AzureActivity, 
AzureDiagnosticsTable
| where TimeGenerated between ((t-timeWin) .. (t+timeWin))
| search "{ip}"
| summarize min(TimeGenerated), count() by SourceTable, CategoryValue, Operation=iff(isempty(OperationName),tolower(OperationNameValue),OperationName), ApplicationName=column_ifexists('application_name_s', ""), Caller, ActivityStatus
| summarize ['Earliest Call']=min(min_TimeGenerated), ActivityStatus=make_list(pack('Status',ActivityStatus,'Count',count_)) by SourceTable, Category=CategoryValue, Operation, ApplicationName, Caller
| extend Chat = iff(isnotempty(Caller),"","")
| extend ChatLink=strcat("https://teams.microsoft.com/l/chat/0/0?users=", Caller)
| extend Email= iff(isnotempty(Caller),"","")
| extend EmailLink=strcat("mailto:",Caller,"{EmailContent}")
| project ['Source Table']=iff(SourceTable == "AzureDiagnosticsTable", "AzureDiagnostics", SourceTable), Category, Operation, ApplicationName, ['Earliest Call'], Caller, Chat, ChatLink, Email, EmailLink, ActivityStatus
| mv-expand ActivityStatus 
| evaluate bag_unpack(ActivityStatus)
| union (print Status='dummy', Count=1 | take 0) // force the columns existance
| evaluate pivot(Status, sum(Count))
| project-rename ['Application Name']=ApplicationName
| extend ['Activity Status'] = column_ifexists('Accepted', 0)+column_ifexists('Failed', 0)+column_ifexists('Succeeded', 0)+column_ifexists('Active', 0)+column_ifexists('Started', 0)+column_ifexists('_Empty', 0)
content.title: Choose a record to present full details:

content.query:
let t = datetime({StartTime});
let timeWin = timespan({TimeWin});
let AzureDiagnosticsTable = view () { (AzureDiagnostics  | extend CategoryValue=Category, OperationName=strcat(OperationName,'/',action_name_s), ActivityStatus=iff(succeeded_s=="true", "Succeeded", "Failed")) };
union withsource=SourceTable isfuzzy=true 
AzureActivity, 
AzureDiagnosticsTable
| where TimeGenerated between ((t-timeWin) .. (t+timeWin))
| search "{ip}"
| extend Operation=iff(isempty(OperationName),tolower(OperationNameValue),OperationName), ApplicationName=column_ifexists('application_name_s', ""), SourceTable=iff(SourceTable == "AzureDiagnosticsTable", "AzureDiagnostics", SourceTable)
| where SourceTable == "{SourceTable}"
| where Operation == "{Operation}"
| where ("{Caller}" == "" and isempty(Caller)) or "{Caller}" == Caller 
| where ("{ApplicationName}" == "" and isempty(ApplicationName)) or "{ApplicationName}" == ApplicationName 
| project-away ['$table']
content.title: Full details
content.noDataMessage: Click a record on the left to see full details

content.json: Search for all the activity on the {SqlName} database:

content.query:
let t = datetime({StartTime});
let timeWin = timespan({TimeWin});
let AzureDiagnosticsTable = view () { (AzureDiagnostics  | extend CategoryValue=Category, OperationName=strcat(OperationName,'/',action_name_s), ActivityStatus=iff(succeeded_s=="true", "Succeeded", "Failed")) };
union withsource=SourceTable isfuzzy=true 
AzureActivity, 
AzureDiagnosticsTable
| where TimeGenerated between ((t-timeWin) .. (t+timeWin))
| search "{SqlName}"
| summarize min(TimeGenerated), count() by SourceTable, CategoryValue, Operation=iff(isempty(OperationName),tolower(OperationNameValue),OperationName), ApplicationName=column_ifexists('application_name_s', ""), Caller, ActivityStatus
| summarize ['Earliest Call']=min(min_TimeGenerated), ActivityStatus=make_list(pack('Status',ActivityStatus,'Count',count_)) by SourceTable, Category=CategoryValue, Operation, ApplicationName, Caller
| extend Chat = iff(isnotempty(Caller),"","")
| extend ChatLink=strcat("https://teams.microsoft.com/l/chat/0/0?users=", Caller)
| extend Email= iff(isnotempty(Caller),"","")
| extend EmailLink=strcat("mailto:",Caller,"{EmailContent}")
| project ['Source Table']=iff(SourceTable == "AzureDiagnosticsTable", "AzureDiagnostics", SourceTable), Category, Operation, ApplicationName, ['Earliest Call'], Caller, Chat, ChatLink, Email, EmailLink, ActivityStatus
| mv-expand ActivityStatus 
| evaluate bag_unpack(ActivityStatus)
| union (print Status='dummy', Count=1 | take 0) // force the columns existance
| evaluate pivot(Status, sum(Count))
| project-rename ['Application Name']=ApplicationName
| extend ['Activity Status'] = column_ifexists('Accepted', 0)+column_ifexists('Failed', 0)+column_ifexists('Succeeded', 0)+column_ifexists('Active', 0)+column_ifexists('Started', 0)+column_ifexists('_Empty', 0)
content.title: Choose a record to present full details:

content.query:
let t = datetime({StartTime});
let timeWin = timespan({TimeWin});
let AzureDiagnosticsTable = view () { (AzureDiagnostics  | extend CategoryValue=Category, OperationName=strcat(OperationName,'/',action_name_s), ActivityStatus=iff(succeeded_s=="true", "Succeeded", "Failed")) };
union withsource=SourceTable isfuzzy=true 
AzureActivity, 
AzureDiagnosticsTable
| where TimeGenerated between ((t-timeWin) .. (t+timeWin))
| search "{SqlName}"
| extend Operation=iff(isempty(OperationName),tolower(OperationNameValue),OperationName), ApplicationName=column_ifexists('application_name_s', ""), SourceTable=iff(SourceTable == "AzureDiagnosticsTable", "AzureDiagnostics", SourceTable)
| where SourceTable == "{SQL_SourceTable}"
| where Operation == "{SQL_Operation}"
| where ("{SQL_Caller}" == "" and isempty(Caller)) or "{SQL_Caller}" == Caller 
| where ("{SQL_ApplicationName}" == "" and isempty(ApplicationName)) or "{SQL_ApplicationName}" == ApplicationName 
| project-away ['$table']
content.title: Full details
content.noDataMessage: Click a record on the left to see full details

content.json: Search for all the activity of principal {PrincipalName}:

content.query:
let t = datetime({StartTime});
let timeWin = timespan({TimeWin});
let AzureDiagnosticsTable = view () { (AzureDiagnostics  | extend CategoryValue=Category, OperationName=strcat(OperationName,'/',action_name_s), ActivityStatus=iff(succeeded_s=="true", "Succeeded", "Failed")) };
union withsource=SourceTable isfuzzy=true 
AzureActivity, 
AzureDiagnosticsTable
| where TimeGenerated between ((t-timeWin) .. (t+timeWin))
| search "{PrincipalName}"
| summarize min(TimeGenerated), count() by SourceTable, CategoryValue, Operation=iff(isempty(OperationName),tolower(OperationNameValue),OperationName), ApplicationName=column_ifexists('application_name_s', ""), Caller, ActivityStatus
| summarize ['Earliest Call']=min(min_TimeGenerated), ActivityStatus=make_list(pack('Status',ActivityStatus,'Count',count_)) by SourceTable, Category=CategoryValue, Operation, ApplicationName, Caller
| extend Chat = iff(isnotempty(Caller),"","")
| extend ChatLink=strcat("https://teams.microsoft.com/l/chat/0/0?users=", Caller)
| extend Email= iff(isnotempty(Caller),"","")
| extend EmailLink=strcat("mailto:",Caller,"{EmailContent}")
| project ['Source Table']=iff(SourceTable == "AzureDiagnosticsTable", "AzureDiagnostics", SourceTable), Category, Operation, ApplicationName, ['Earliest Call'], Caller, Chat, ChatLink, Email, EmailLink, ActivityStatus
| mv-expand ActivityStatus 
| evaluate bag_unpack(ActivityStatus)
| union (print Status='dummy', Count=1 | take 0) // force the columns existance
| evaluate pivot(Status, sum(Count))
| project-rename ['Application Name']=ApplicationName
| extend ['Activity Status'] = column_ifexists('Accepted', 0)+column_ifexists('Failed', 0)+column_ifexists('Succeeded', 0)+column_ifexists('Active', 0)+column_ifexists('Started', 0)+column_ifexists('_Empty', 0)
content.title: Choose a record to present full details:

content.query:
let t = datetime({StartTime});
let timeWin = timespan({TimeWin});
let AzureDiagnosticsTable = view () { (AzureDiagnostics  | extend CategoryValue=Category, OperationName=strcat(OperationName,'/',action_name_s), ActivityStatus=iff(succeeded_s=="true", "Succeeded", "Failed")) };
union withsource=SourceTable isfuzzy=true 
AzureActivity, 
AzureDiagnosticsTable
| where TimeGenerated between ((t-timeWin) .. (t+timeWin))
| search "{PrincipalName}"
| extend Operation=iff(isempty(OperationName),tolower(OperationNameValue),OperationName), ApplicationName=column_ifexists('application_name_s', ""), SourceTable=iff(SourceTable == "AzureDiagnosticsTable", "AzureDiagnostics", SourceTable)
| where SourceTable == "{PN_SourceTable}"
| where Operation == "{PN_Operation}"
| where ("{PN_Caller}" == "" and isempty(Caller)) or "{PN_Caller}" == Caller 
| where ("{PN_ApplicationName}" == "" and isempty(ApplicationName)) or "{PN_ApplicationName}" == ApplicationName 
| project-away ['$table']
content.title: Full details
content.noDataMessage: Click a record on the left to see full details

content.json:
Step 2: Validate the activity with the relevant users


This section presents users with control plane activity (ARM) around the alert time.
  • Contact one of the users - can they explain the activity?

Select a user to contact regarding the activity:

content.query:
let t = datetime({StartTime});
let timeWin = timespan({TimeWin});
AzureActivity
| where TimeGenerated between ((t-timeWin) .. (t+timeWin))
| where ActivityStatusValue == "Succeeded"
| where SubscriptionId == "{SubscriptionId}"
| where Caller has '@'
| summarize latestActivity=max(TimeGenerated) by Caller, hasAccessedResourceGroup=(ResourceGroup == "{ResourceGroup}"), hasAccessedResource=(ResourceId == "{ResourceId}")
| extend Chat = iff(isnotempty(Caller),"","")
| extend ChatLink=strcat("https://teams.microsoft.com/l/chat/0/0?users=", Caller)
| extend Email= iff(isnotempty(Caller),"","")
| extend EmailLink=strcat("mailto:",Caller,"{EmailContent}")
| order by hasAccessedResource desc, hasAccessedResourceGroup desc, latestActivity desc
| project-rename ['Accessed Resource']=hasAccessedResource, ['Accessed Resource Group']=hasAccessedResourceGroup
| take 10

content.json:
Step 3: Remediation steps


This section links to common remeditaion steps that can be applied.

content.query:
let server = print ent=dynamic({Entities})
| mvexpand ent
| where ent.Type == 'azure-resource'
| project AzureID=tostring(ent.ResourceId)
;
server
| project AzureID, ['Turn on auditing for the server']=strcat('https://ms.portal.azure.com/#@microsoft.onmicrosoft.com/resource',tostring(trim_end("/databases/.*$",AzureID)),"/serverAuditing"), 
['Configure server firewall']=strcat('https://ms.portal.azure.com/#@microsoft.onmicrosoft.com/resource',trim_end("/databases/.*$",AzureID),"/firewall"),
ASCLink = "{ASCLink}"
| project AzureID, Actions=pack_array("View the alert in Azure Defender:", 'Turn on auditing for the server:', "Configure server firewall:"), Links=pack_array(ASCLink, ['Turn on auditing for the server'], ['Configure server firewall'])
| mvexpand Actions, Links
| where isnotempty( Links)

print RemediationSteps=dynamic({RemediationSteps})
| mv-expand RemediationSteps to typeof(string)
| extend RemediationSteps=todynamic(RemediationSteps)
| extend RemediationSteps.kind
| project Recommendation=iff(isempty(RemediationSteps.kind), RemediationSteps,tostring(RemediationSteps.displayValue)),
        Action=iff(tostring(RemediationSteps.kind) == "Link", tostring(RemediationSteps.value),""),
        Resource=iff(tostring(RemediationSteps.kind) == "openBlade", replace("resourceId=","",tostring(RemediationSteps.detailBladeInputs)),"")
